description:
No more trying to stuff your thickest socks into your favourite Blunnies. With their fully waterproof construction and efficient Thinsulate insulation, the Thermal All-Terrain boots are ready for winter from coast-to-coast.

  • Uppers are waterproof nubuck leather, seamlessly fused to the soles for resilient construction
  • Waterproof elastic on the sides and waterproof taped seams
  • Thinsulate™ insulation retains warmth if wet and dries fast
  • Insoles are sheepskin wool that helps wick moisture away from your foot keeping them dry and thus warm
  • Pull loops for extra leverage
  • Vibram® outsoles are slip-resistant and heavily lugged to shed snow and slush with ease
  • Round toe, medium width
  • These are sold in Australian sizes, which are different than Canadian/American sizes. Refer to the size chart to determine your correct size
name: Blundstone Winter Thermal All-Terrain 2242 Boots - Unisex
